column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I had never planted a tree before , so before we planted one , I had to do a lot of research .
#text=I had to look up what kind of tree would work best in my climate .
#text=I had to see which ones needed certain levels of care , look up different tree diseases , and the prices of some trees .
#text=I had to find something that would work well in my yard .
#text=When we finally picked a perfect tree , we had to take it home .
#text=Once we had it home , we had to dig a very big hole .
#text=After you roll the tree into the hole , you have to do something called facing the tree , which means you put the tree in the position you are happy with the already existing branches growing .
#text=You do n't want a huge branch going right toward your house !
#text=To make facing easier , you should fill the hole halfway with water before putting the tree inside .
#text=After you face the tree , fill in the dirt , and pat yourself on the back for a job well done .
